scripts.launch:prod: npm install && webpack --mode production && dotnet run -c Release --environment="Production"
scripts.publish:dev: npm run build:dev && dotnet publish -o publish
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build:prod && dotnet publish -c Release -o publish
scripts.launch-docker: docker build . -t yet-another-image && docker run yet-another-image -p 5000:5000
scripts.launch-docker:dev: npm run publish:dev && npm run launch-docker -- -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development
scripts.launch-docker:prod: npm run publish:prod && npm run launch-docker -- -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production
